00028 class Logger {

00037         bool m_writeFileLine;

00040 
00041         bool writable(LogLevel l) const {
00042                 if (l >= m_logLevel) {
00043                         return true;
00044                 }
00045                 return false;
00046         }
00047

00064                 m_logLevel = l;
00065         }
00066

00068                 AutoMutex a(m_logLevelMtx);
00069                 return m_logLevel;

00082         void info(char* format, ...) {
00083 
00084                 if (!writable(INFO))
00085                         return;
00086                 va_list args;
00087                 va_start(args, format);
00088                 common(INFO, format, args);
00089                 va_end(args);
00090 
00091         }
00092         ;
00093

00095 
00096                 if (!writable(WARNING))
00097                         return;

00101                 va_end(args);

00103         }
00104         ;

00115         }

00119

00149 
00150 #define MT_LOGINIT_STATIC(classname)                                                                                                                                                                            \
00151         LoggerPtr m_logger = mt::LoggerFactory::instance()->getLogger<classname>(#classname); \
00152         std::string m_loggerPrefix;
00153 
00154 #define MT_LOG_SETPREFIX_STATIC(prefix)\
00155         std::stringstream str;\
00156         str << prefix;\
00157         m_loggerPrefix = str.str();
00158 
00159 #define MT_LOGINIT(classname)                                                                                                                                                                           \
00160         m_logger = mt::LoggerFactory::instance()->getLogger<classname>(#classname); \
00161 
00162 #define MT_LOG_SETPREFIX(prefix)\
00163         std::stringstream str; \
00164         str << prefix;  \
00165         m_loggerPrefix = str.str();
00166 
00167 #define MT_LOGDEBUG(message)                                                                                                                                                                    \
00168         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00169                 if(!m_logger)                                                                                                                                                           \
00170                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::LoggerException, "No logger implementation");  \
00171                 std::stringstream str;\
00172                 if(m_loggerPrefix.length())     \
00173                 str<<m_loggerPrefix<<": ";              \
00174                 str << message;                                                                                                                                 \
00175                 if(mt::LoggerFactory::instance()->writeFileLine())                                                      \
00176                         str << " | " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__;                                                                            \
00177                 m_logger->debug(const_cast<char*>("%s"), str.str().c_str());                    \
00178         }
00179

00182                 if(!m_logger)                                                                                                                                                                                                                   \

00190                 m_logger->warn(const_cast<char*>("%s"), str.str().c_str());                             \
00191         }
